Class PieceColorMap

  • java.lang.Object

        • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica5.views.PieceColorMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<Piece,java.awt.Color>

    public class PieceColorMap
extends java.util.HashMap<Piece,java.awt.Color>
    Class PieceColorMap A class that represents a map that tells a piece a color to paint itself.

    Una clase que representa un mapa que dice de que color pintar cada pieza.

    Author:
    David Fdez Alcoba, Manuel Sánchez Torrón.
    See Also:
